# For loops

```{r}
sequence <- 1:10
for (i in sequence) {
  for (j in sequence) {
    print(paste(i, ',', j))
  }
}
```

# While loops

```{r}
final_letter <- 'Z'
current_letter <- 'A'

while (current_letter != final_letter) {
  print(current_letter)
  letter_pos <- which(current_letter == LETTERS)
  current_letter <- LETTERS[letter_pos + 1]
}

print(LETTERS[letter_pos + 1])   # for completeness
```
